Entry Requirements:
Full-Time Students:
• For entry into Year 1: Advanced National Diploma in Human Resource Management.
• Those who have sat for G.C.E (A/L) and qualified with minimum Three (03) simple passes are eligible for the first year of the degree program.
• Those without A/L passes must complete the Certificate Course in Business Management (CCBM).
• Those who have completed G.C.E (O/L) / Edexcel / Cambridge O/L must successfully complete the Foundation Programme for Bachelor’s Degree.

For entry into Year 2: Completion of Advanced National Diploma in Human Resource Management.

Part-Time Students / Professionals:
• A/L qualified with 3 years’ work experience, or
• O/L qualified with 5 years’ work experience, or
• Completion of Advanced Certificate in Human Resource Management (ACHRM).

Entry Requirements:

After A/L Students: Those who have sat for G.C.E (A/L) and qualified with minimum Three (03) simple passes are eligible for the first year of the degree program. Those without Three (03) simple passes must follow the Certificate in Business Management (CBM) during the first year. Those who have completed G.C.E (O/L) must complete the Foundation Course in Business Management before entering the first year.

For Professionals (ADBM): G.C.E (A/L) with 3 years’ work experience, or G.C.E (O/L) with 5 years’ work experience, or completion of the Advanced Certificate in Business Management (ACBM).

For entry into Year 2: Successful completion of the Advanced Diploma in Business Management (Full Time/Part Time).

For entry into Year 3: Successful completion of the Higher National Diploma in Business Management.
Career Opportunities: Business Manager, Project Manager, Operations Manager, Management Consultant, Marketing Executive, Business Analyst, Human Resource Executive, Strategic Planner, Entrepreneur

Entry Requirements:
For entry into Year 1: Advanced Diploma in Financial Management and Accounting.

For after A/L students – Full-time path: Those who have sat for G.C.E (A/L) and qualified with minimum Three (03) simple passes are eligible for the first year. Those without Three (03) simple passes must complete the Certificate in Business Management (CBM) during the first year. Students who have completed G.C.E (O/L) must complete the Foundation Course in Business Management before entering the first year.

For professionals – Part-time path: G.C.E (A/L) with 3 years’ work experience, or G.C.E (O/L) with 5 years’ work experience, or completion of the Advanced Certificate in Financial & Management Accounting (ACFMA), or part qualification of professional programs such as AAT, CA, ACCA, CIMA, or CMA (subject to approval).

Entry Requirements:
For entry into Year 1: Advanced Diploma in Digital Banking and Finance.

For after A/L Students – Full-time path: GCE (A/L) with minimum three (03) simple passes, or GCE (A/L) without three passes must follow Certification in Business Management (CBM), or completion of GCE (O/L) with Foundation Course in Business Management.

For Professionals – Part-time path: GCE (A/L) with 3 years’ work experience, or GCE (O/L) with 5 years’ work experience, or completion of Advanced Certificate in Digital Banking and Finance, or part qualification of professional programs such as AAT, CA, ACCA, CIMA, CMA (approval by course director required).

For entry into Year 2: Completion of Advanced Diploma in Digital Banking and Finance, Diploma in Applied Banking and Finance (IBSL) with 5 years’ work experience, or Postgraduate Diploma in Bank Management (IBSL) with 3 years’ work experience (short course in Technology of Banking and Finance required).

For entry into Year 3: Completion of Higher National Diploma in Digital Banking and Finance.

Full-Time Path: Rs.1,568,000.00
Part-Time Path: Rs.1,518,000.00
Career Opportunities: Banking Analyst, Financial Analyst, Investment Banking Associate, Risk and Compliance Officer, Corporate Banking Executive, FinTech Consultant, Treasury Analyst, Credit Risk Manager

• At least an ‘S’ pass for Mathematics and English at G.C.E. O/L.
